channel.title: Read if your pro
channel.description:
if you are experienced with online hosting then could you help me out?
ok, to host a server online what do i have to do (make it 24-7)
1. host the batch file [i]and if so how do i run it online?[/i] 2. host the whole file? 3. other? and if it is other can you help me?
feed back and no spam and flaming would be nice thanks,

i could host it 20/7 for you
